title: Cream Soda
info: The Cream Soda is a food item that is dropped by the Cursed Skull (1.43%) and the Giant Cursed Skull (2.86%). When consumed, it grants the player the Plenty Satisfied buff for 16 minutes.
stat:

Food
Use time17 (Very fast)
TooltipMedium improvements to all stats
